==Descriptions==
{{Description|The laughter of the old days and the cries of cicadas were at last lost to the thunder. The people of today only remember that this place was abandoned due to the furious, unchecked storms.|Viewpoint, [[Viewpoint/The Silent Fishing Village|The Silent Fishing Village]]}}
